评论概述: Crop top if your anywhere near or around 5'8"
评论详情: This is great for my long arms, but dear god, this is definitely a crop top (I'm 5'8", 180 lb.) Either that, or someone with no torso. It's too short, which makes it a poor fit. I bought this because it looked like a full length shirt in the picture. But it goes up at least 2 inches above my belly button.  The positives are that this shirt is sooooo soft, and the sleeve length fits. Amazing quality material that is incredibly soft.  I gave it to my 18 year old daughter who appreciates crop tops (she is 5'7", 140 lb) and it still fits her as a crop top above her belly button.
Perfect for under sweaters or sweatshirt or just on its own! I’m 5’7”, 122#. Medium fits perfect. Love the thumb holes. Just got back on here to order more!
I didn’t realize this was a crop top, wanted a regular shirt😩

this shirt is so so soft! i wish i was a little longer because it is a bit awkward length in between regular and cropped. it is also slightly see through but other than that it is amazing especially at such a low price point.
Love this shirt. The thumb holes are cute. Bought it in many colors.

This shirts are fabulous! Super soft and stretchy, thumb holes are long and nice, I had issues with other brands where it felt like the fabric was cutting me, not this one! I have two pairs and getting more because I’m wearing them almost daily!

I was skeptical due to the price, but the quality is great! The torso length is short, but I bought this shirt intentionally to wear with my high waisted, wide-leg jeans so it’s perfect. I’m ordering more colors!
Love these tops they are so soft and comfy, perfect length wash and dry very nice...

评论概述: Soft and stretchy but not what I was looking for
评论详情: The short is very soft fabric, especially inside. The color is a lighter red than what shows on the picture. I ordered a medium due to my chest (36DD) and a small would have worked. The material is stretchy kind of spandex so it wasn’t what I was looking for. Also long on the arms.
Love these tee shirts must go up in size for lose fit
I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this shirt since the price point is so low. The fabric is thick & stretchy. My daughter absolutely loved it.

I love this so much I have it in multiple colors. It is hard to find tops that work with a short torso on a 5’1” frame. It’s cropped but in a good way. Hits at the perfect spot on my waistline without showing any skin. It’s soft, stretchy, and flattering. Can’t wait to buy more.

评论概述: Soft, comfortably snug, and nice stretch
评论详情: The quality is really good, the material is buttery soft, the stretch is ideal, the color is the same as the picture, and the length of the arms and neck line is perfect, but it fits way more like a crop top on me and I think I have a pretty average bust line, so it's not from being busty. Lol!  It's still really cute, just fits way shorter in the torso than the photo shows.

I'm 5'1" and 115 pounds and the small fits me well. However, while the length would be a crop top on a longer torso/taller person, on me it falls beyond my waist. The hot pink color is lighter than the product photos - more like a light pink than the vibrant pink shown. Otherwise, the fabric is soft, stretchy and very comfortable to wear.

Love this shirt so much I have 4 of them. They are soft, wash well with no shrinkage & have wonderful long sleeves which I need since I have long arms. They work well with high waisted leggings & look wonderful. Thank you for making a shirt with long sleeves!
This material feels like butter, and is super warm. The color doesnt bleed either!
Flattering and comfortable
It matches my other outfits just right.

I love these tops! I have it in 4 colors! It's soft like butter, I love the thumb holes too. They are a smidge short on the belly but I just wear them with higher-waisted bottoms. I got an XL and I am 5'6, about 180 lbs with a 36-inch waist.

Love how thick this shirt will definitely keep you warm for winter months and I love the thumb holes, very stretchy and comfortable fit. Fits true to size and cute trendy color great value for money I recommend!
I love the color, but it was too snug.

These are extremely short and I have a short torso.  I was looking forward to getting them, and when I did, at first glance and touch - they were great.  Super soft and the sleeves are long.  However, I ordered 4 of them and each one came down just below my bra line and above my belly button.  Since I was planning to wear them as undershirts, I tried it on anyway and the material around the waste rolls up, so it definitely isn't going to work.  If you don't mind a crop top, these might be for you!

Got it for an olive oil Halloween costume and was worried it would be too tight. I’m usually a medium but I got a large and it fit perfectly. Will definitely be wearing this for regular use. Want more colors!
Material and size are great however the color purple is more like a lilac.

评论概述: Color come off on your skin
评论详情: This shirt the color comes off on your skin and I’m not even sure why
This came very fast. Love the color and the light material.

My daughter just turned 11. She's big into the y2k style and this made a great fall birthday gift. The fit is good except for the shoulders being wide and sticking out, other than that, it's great. Sleeves aren't too long, it's a mild almost crop top length, super super soft, has some stretch, not thick not thin. Got her an extra small, she is 53 in tall, 100#, 33-30-34. The reason for the 4 stars and not 5 is that we ordered 4 more 2 in small and 2 in extra small. And all 4 fit differently depending on the color. The navy is tight with no stretch and the pink is super stretchy and is "bigger" than the small as an xs. So keep that in mind that you may want to size up if you aren't sure. She's asked for more of them so I might get a medium and see how it fits.
This shirt is very soft the arms are sooooo comfy and perfect with the thumb wholes. BUT I am larger in the chest and this shirt is just too short length wise.
Love how this shirt feels. Its so soft and stretchy. I love the sleeves. They are perfect for people that have long arms.
This top is SO soft - it almost feels like a soft sweater material. It's super stretchy and gives a great, fitted look.
The fabric is soft and the color looks just like the image but there are some darker lines along deep creases that dont come out even with a wash.

Put this on immediately. It's going to be perfect for the cold weather. I love the scallop hem on the bottom. I think that's what it's called. Not sure but it's very flattering. I got the size MD just bc I'm tall and trying to hide a small belly haha. I'm happy I did though. It will go with so much and great for layering too. It arrives packed pretty tightly so you can see the label imprinted on the front of the shirt but I'm sure that will come out.

Although it's still a little too warm here for this sweater, I wore it the other day with a nice pair of palazzo slacks. It fit quite well, and I felt good in it. I was reminded, though, that I need to wait a couple more months before I wear it again! Still, I'm glad I ordered it. I like it better than some sweaters that I've worn in the past.

Knit ribbed top with thumb hole.  The top falls right at my waistline with a curved hem.  Material is soft and stretchy.  I like wearing this when I go for a morning run.  The thumb hole feature allows the shirt to help keep my hands warm on cold days.
Love it, very nice
I love this shirt. It is so comfortable. I wear it as a undershirt under my T-shirt to wear to work to stay warm in the cold air conditioning.

I typically like this brand of clothing because the material is so soft and comfortable. This long sleeve jersey is that. And, the red color is nice, albeit more an orange-red than a passion red. However, an XS was much too small on me and I’m typically an XS. Also, the shoulders didn’t fit quite right. Lastly, be advised that it is a bit short in length, so consider your chest size when you decide whether or not you want a shirt that comes up higher than your waist.

I took a chance on this top I liked the fit in the picture. Let me tell you it is like mini Miro ribbed material, has great stretch, not to thin or thick. It isn't crop but comes down right to my waist witch i like I will be ordering more colors for fall and winter. Super cute appearance.

I usually wear a medium or large even but this I should have gotten a XXX. I know it's crop though so that's my fault but it's very very short in the front. I love the fabric first off it's super soft and warm. What would even be better is if the front was a little longer so it would keep all of me warm and not just my arms. Which brings me to the only positive I can say about this is the fabric as well as the length of the arms is amazing. This is what I look for in my clothing as well as the thumb holes you can't go wrong with comfort level. So it's really really short and unfortunately I won't be wearing as even with a tee shirt underneath it would be pretty tight since I'm not a size -12.

My 13-year-old daughter loves long-sleeved shirts because it is always cold at school. This white top is so soft and comfortable. It is thicker than most shirts, but not flannel or bulky. The fabric is incredibly soft and it washes well. The sizing seems true to size as my daughter is 5'4" and 100 lbs. The sleeves are longer - mid palm, but my daughter likes that. I also like that the fabric has a slight ribbed texture for added fashion.
The material is good, simple but beautiful design, comfortable to wear.
I love it, feels thick enough for fall and winter with a good jacket Super soft, material is great

This top is very comfy and flattering, perfect for cool late-summer evenings. I got it for my 15-year-old daughter to wear at the end of her summer vacation, and when she goes back to school. She likes it a lot. She likes the dark grey color, and the fabric feels like it's made well. And above all, she says the design is pretty flattering.  The fit shown in the product description is fairly accurate. It seems to be just slightly undersized. But my daughter says that the sizing is correct, because the stretch makes it feel comfortable.  After washing/drying this shirt a few times, the fit, fabric, and stitching are all still terrific.  This is a nicely-made, flattering top for fall. I recommend it.

I ordered a small and this shirt is really big, and baggy and not fitted at all. The sleeves are very, very long and completely cover my hands. Just does not look or fit like the display picture, and its a bit overpriced for the quality and look of the shirt.
I can’t take this off! It’s so comfy, the fabric is lovely and the fit is great. Get 2
This shirt is very soft, sleeves are a little long but it's cute

I bought 2 of these for layering and they are perfect. I have a long torso and it is not too short or too long. Soft material, washes well and a great price. I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase!

I love the soft material of this long-sleeved ribbed knit top. I didn't see that I ordered a crop top, and I don't usually wear short tops, but I plan on wearing it underneath a cardigan. The green color is really pretty!

I got this long sleeve and the first thing I noticed was the horrible smell when I opened it. It smelled like bad body oder so it went straight to the washing machine. It was bad. After a good wash I got it out and it’s pretty soft and stretchy. Not itchy at all which is great. It’s an alright long sleeve, nothing special.
Super soft material. Stretchy and feels like good quality. The rounded edge on bottom is flattering. Runs large. Usually I am a small and the small is big. Size down. 5,7 -135 for sizing ref.

This shirt is super soft.  It is stretchy and well made. I like the thumb holes but the sleeves are too long.It is a crop top and even a short chubby girl isn’t going to get full coverage in an XL.  I would totally buy another one if it came as a regular shirt.

It is a great weight for fall/winter. It is a cross between a sweater and sweatshirt. The fabric is stretchy. The sleeve are long with thumb cut outs. The top is a true crop top. I ordered navy blue and it is true to color.
Great fabric love the army green. The top runs just a bit small I ordered XL but it is more like a L. The fabric has weight to it and stretches . Definitely more for fall . 5 stars

评论概述: Love the Look, Love the thumbholes
评论详情: Everything with thumbholes makes my life better in any amount of ways, and I really like that the rest of this shirt is neat in its own way. The knitted look is appealing, the color is nice, the length of it is appreciated, and the thumbholes are the best part, but I'm biased as I love thumbholes.
Thos feels great on my skin. It's so comfortable, I could fall asleep in this. This will keep me warm in the winter. For the price, I think this is great.

The fabric is much softer than I expected. It feels like a blanket and it’s very warm. The coffee color looks a bit purple toned in person but it is extremely cute. The sleeves are very long which is nice for my long arms. I ordered an XS and it fits very nicely without being too short. The ribbed fabric is a nice feel and not too noticeable upon wearing. Great shirt for a great price.

This modern, cute, well made, top has thumb holes in the sleeves and runs true to size.  The material it is made from is not too thick nor too thin but is soft and comfortable.  The sewing is excellent.  I washed it in cold water and hung it to dry and it came out wearable.  This is great for matching for with jeans.

评论概述: Be Ready Because It is Truly 'Crop'
评论详情: WIHOLL Crop Top is seriously cropped.  Key Observations:  - Sleeves are quite long - Sizing is good - fits well - Color is vibrant and pretty - Material is ideal (not too thick nor too thin) - The mostly polyester fabric is soft and feels good on the skin - 10% spandex gives the top a more form fitting shape - Crewneck lays nicely - Construction and stitching are solid - no visible flaws - I like the subtle curve at the bottom - Ribbed style is good-looking  For your consideration:  I noticed the tissue in between the folded shirt and the clear plastic bag both were stained pink. I did a hand wash test and the color does run. I highly recommend not machine washing this shirt with other clothes in fear that everything will come out pink.  Overall, this is a good quality crop top and the value is decent based on the craftmanship and style (maybe a tiny bit high in price). Just be careful when laundering!
Great lightweight shirt to be worn on any occasion. Fits well. Soft material. Good for screen printing as well
